snippet: The first-time starters Blake Griffin of the Clippers and Andrew Bynum of the Lakers were voted to the N.B.A. All-Star Game, joining the Lakers’ Kobe Bryant and the Clippers’ Chris Paul.
abstract: Los Angeles Clippers Blake Griffin and Chris Paul, along with Los Angeles Lakers Andrew Bynum and Kobe Bryant, are voted to the NBA All-Star Game; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: The first-time starters Blake Griffin of the Clippers and Andrew Bynum of the Lakers were voted to the N.B.A. All-Star Game, joining the Lakers’ Kobe Bryant and the Clippers’ Chris Paul.

headline.seo: Los Angeles Winds Up With 4 All-Star Starters
headline.main: Los Angeles Winds Up With 4 All-Star Starters
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Winds Up With 4 All-Star Starters
